wikipedia_page.main: Joe Scarborough (born 9 May 1938) is an English artist. He is most famous for painting humorous scenes of Sheffield life - everyday "real" images of the life and people of South Yorkshire.

response: In January 2021, Scarborough excoriated the Capitol Hill Police for having enabled the attack at the U.S. Capitol by Donald Trump supporters.'You opened the f---ing doors for 'em!': Joe Scarborough tears into Capitol Police over flimsy security and racial double standards He claimed a double standard that had the perpetrators been either black or Muslim, they likely would have been dealt with more harshly.

Morning Joe is a weekday MSNBC morning news and talk show, airing from 6 a.m. to 9 a.m. Eastern Time. It features Joe Scarborough providing both enterprise reporting and discussion on the news of the day in a panel format with co-hosts Mika Brzezinski and Willie Geist. The show features in-depth discussions that help drive the day's political conversation.

* Matt Lauer interviews Joe Scarborough on The Today Show 06/09/09
It has a number of paintings on display, including one by Sheffield artist Joe Scarborough.Art UK Fire and Police Museum at Sheffield
|3 June 2008"Joe Scarborough joins 'Walk of Fame'", Sheffield Telegraph, 3 June 2008
Notable artists linked with Sheffield include John Ruskin, Joe Scarborough, Pete McKee, the Designers Republic, Thom Wilson and Kid Acne.

In Spring 2019, Portland Works was the subject for a new painting by British artist, Joe Scarborough. Titled "Life in the Big Village", the painting depicted a cutaway view of Portland Works set within a wider Sheffield city backdrop. A limited edition series of prints was subsequently made available for purchase
* Joe Scarborough (born 1938),  English painter of humorous scenes of the life and people in South Yorkshire
* Joe Scarborough (born 1963), American politician, cable TV news personality, and musician
